name: #RPGSpree 9: A Portrait & A Palace
description:
After the Collapse, in which human society crumbled, the historians of the new era have mastered a form of psychometry – through meditative rituals they pry open the mind palaces of the long-dead and glean what wisdom they can from their contents. From these expeditions many old sciences have been resurrected, ancient artifacts recovered, and the plots for many a play inspired!

A small game about collaboratively description and drawing conclusions from it.

Create and explore the palace, draw the map, and work out what sort of person might create such a place.
